      (package private) void getLocation(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap mMap, boolean sendSMS)
      First makes sure permissions are granted, uses FusedLocationProvider Client to get last location when available (latitude/longitude), and animate the Google map camera to the current location (or move camera if preferred) Calls SMS function if bool is set (used when clicking on contacts).

      • HelpButton

        void HelpButton()
        Function that is called when the HELP button is pressed on phone or wristband First checks for location permissions Obtains last known location from FusedLocationProviderClient (lat/longitude) Creates two URLs.. One for current location via SMS (url), and one to be used for the parseJsonData function to display nearest safe places (urljson).

      • startMqtt

        private void startMqtt(java.lang.String topic,
                       java.lang.String currentLat,
                       java.lang.String currentLongi,
                       java.lang.String lat,
                       java.lang.String longi)
        Function to publish and subscribe to/from mqtt broker
        Parameters:
        topic - topic in MQTT broker to subscribe/publish to
        currentLat - Current latitude to send to wristband
        currentLongi - Current longitude to send to wristband
        lat - Destinaton latitude to send to wristband
        longi - Destinaton longitude to send to wristband

        private void requestPermissions()
        Requests location permissions (Fine location)

      • onMapReady

        public void onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
        Checks for location permissions first. If permissions are granted, then enable "My location" and calls getLocation function to fetch current location latitude/longitude data
        Specified by:
        onMapReady in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
        Parameters:
        googleMap - Google maps map instance

      • sendSMSMessage

        public void sendSMSMessage(boolean sendDest)
        First, checks for SMS permissions If at least one phone number has been set, sends message Either set to send destination location (nearby safe place) by SMS or only current location by SMS.
        Parameters:
        sendDest - determines whether or not to send destination location by SMS (if true, sends destination)

        onRequestPermissionsResult in interface android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback
        Overrides:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • SendTextMsg

        private void SendTextMsg(java.lang.Boolean boolDest)
        Sends the SMS using SmsManager Depending on how the function was called, either sends current location or sends destination location (next safe place). If contact icons are clicked in the app, sends current location to that specific contact. If HELP button is pressed, sends to all contacts with a phone number set up.
        Parameters:
        boolDest -

      • parseJsonData

        void parseJsonData(java.lang.String jsonString)
        Reads the JSON url link as a string (jsonString) Obtains the relevant results and stores in an array of class "Locations". Also stores only names as a seperate array, to be displayed in a clickable list in the UI, if the list option is enabled. If "instant" navigation is turned on, app automatically navigates to nearest location
        Parameters:
        jsonString - the content of the JSON url of nearby places, as a string

      • Navigation

        void Navigation(java.util.ArrayList<Locations> al,
                int i)

      • batteryLife

        void batteryLife()
        Checks battery life of the phone. If battery level is low, calls vibrate function (optional) and displays message. Sends a notification to the phone to alert the user that battery is low. If battery level is critical, also sends a help signal (SMS) to contacts with current location URL.

      • sendNotification

        void sendNotification(int batLevel)

      • getLocation

        void getLocation(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap mMap,
                 boolean sendSMS)
        First makes sure permissions are granted, uses FusedLocationProvider Client to get last location when available (latitude/longitude), and animate the Google map camera to the current location (or move camera if preferred) Calls SMS function if bool is set (used when clicking on contacts).
        Parameters:
        mMap - Google Map instance (to animate camera)
        sendSMS - Boolean to determine whether or not to send message with current location URL

      • vibrate

        void vibrate()
        Called by battery warning function to vibrate to alert user that phone needs charging. Pattern set to vibrate once (no repeat).
